## getRandomBytes() function

generates Uint8Array with random bytes of size n

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getRandomBytes(n: number): Uint8Array;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | number | size of array |

**Returns:**

Uint8Array

Uint8Array
